products.name: Masters of the Universe Legends Maquette 1/5 Beast Man 56 cm
products.description:
Sideshow and Tweeterhead presents the new Beast Man "Legends" Maquette! Controller of the wild creatures of Eternia and Skeletor's most savage and loyal henchmen!

This new Beast Man Maquette measures roughly 19" tall (top of his back) to 22.2" tall (top of whip), 14.5" wide, and 14.4" deep when fully assembled - from the bottom of the base, to the top of the back or whip, to the furthest out points on the base and accessories.

This fully sculpted polyresin statue comes with a brutal amount of deadly detail in all his reimagined glory! Armed with his lethal whip and clad in his intricately re-designed armor, Beast Man is engulfed in newly re-envisioned details - Trophy-like skulls re-purposed as armor, knives, tools and pouches, aged deadly spikes, and of course his iconic compass...

Guarding the depths of Snake Mountain, this base is themed to display perfectly with your other Evil Warriors - Mer-Man, Trap Jaw, and Skeletor! It also has easter-eggs galore, showcasing the ancient remnants of its previous residents - the Snake Men...

This Beast Man Maquette also comes with two unique portraits, one more "Modern" and one more "Classic", giving Masters of the Universe fans the option to display him a couple of different ways with the rest of their Masters of the Universe collectibles.

Product Size: 56 x 37 x 37 cm

products.name: G.I. Joe Classified Series Cobra Island Action Figure 2021 Alvin Breaker Kibbey with Ram Cycle 15 cm
products.description:
G.I. Joe is a highly skilled, on-demand, special operations force of men and women from around the globe. These extraordinarily talented heroes are selected for their elite abilities and tasked with defending the world from Cobra, a ruthless criminal organization bent on total domination. With unwavering courage and steely determination, the brave members of G.I. Joe are prepared to seek out Cobra in any environment on the planet. From hostile jungles to ice-clad arctic peaks...wherever there's trouble, G.I. Joe is there.

This Alvin "Breaker" Kinney figure comes ready for action, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability and character-inspired accessories. And with custom artwork by John Tyler Christopher, the G.I. Joe Classified Series Special Missions: Cobra Island Alvin "Breaker" Kinney with RAM Cycle package will make a mark on shelves.

products.name: G.I. Joe FigZero Action Figure 1/6 Storm Shadow 30 cm
products.description:
Hasbro and threezero are thrilled to offer Storm Shadow as the next installment of the G.I. Joe 1/6 scale collection of articulated figures redesigned by threezero as inspired by Hasbro's retro G.I. Joe characters.

Although he has a conflicted loyalty between the Cobra Organization and G.I. Joe, Storm Shadow is most known as ninja bodyguard for the villainous Cobra Commander and for his shared history and bloodline with Snake Eyes. Highly-trained in Longbow, Katana, and Nunchaku, Storm Shadow moves at lightning speed and is a formidable opponent.

Standing at 12" (30 cm) tall, the 1/6 Storm Shadow collectible figure features threezero's standard fully-articulated body with realistic seamless arms, fabric hand-tailored costuming, and a high attention to detail. The 1/6 Storm Shadow figure comes with loadout of Accessories including Nunchaku, Recurve Bow, Quivers and Arrows, two Katanas, tactical pouches, and a total of five pairs of interchangeable hands.

Features:

- Officially Licensed by Hasbro
- Approximately 12" tall (~30 cm)
- 22 Points of Articulation
- Detailed Storm Shadow masked headsculpt
- Realistic seamless arms with soft PVC dermis

Costume:

- Tactical vest with posable fabric hood
- Bracers
- Trousers
- Utility Belt
- Cross-body Belt
- Gaiters
- Boots

Accessories:

- One (1) Nunchaku
- One (1) Recurve Bow
- Two (2) Quivers
- Two (2) Katanas with Sheathes
- Three (3) Tactical Pouches
- Four (4) Arrows
- Five (5) Pairs of Interchangeable Hands
